item.title: A Stroll Through Leeds with River Island
item.description:
A Stroll Through Leeds with River Island

It's that time of the year again and winter is coming which means I have to brave the cold and venture up to friendly Yorkshire in the north of England.

item.title: Girls of London Fashion Week 2015: Street Style Journal 05
item.description:
Girls of London Fashion Week 2015: Street Style Journal 05

Photography can be a cruel mistress as one day you are buzzing with excitement to go and explore new places and the next you're burdened by the ever present challenges of life.

item.title: Exploring St Paul's Cathedral with Ralph Lauren
item.description:
Exploring St Paul's Cathedral with Ralph Lauren

For my latest lookbook I decided to team up with an old Style Divisioner Themba and get up close and personal with St Paul's Cathedral, an iconic London landmark that has truly stood the test of time.

item.title: Exploring City of London with Farrell Clothing
item.description:
Exploring City of London with Farrell Clothing

One can get very complacent when living in London as having so many historical landmarks a few underground stops away makes it easy to put off visiting them.

item.title: Cash Rules2 // Vlog 9
item.description:
Cash Rules2 // Vlog 9

Trying to get into a habit of doing one of these every other weekend. Having a hard time deciding on song choice so atm it's either Drake or an amazing version Born To Die by New Mantra.

item.title: Follow Us On YouTube
item.description:
Follow Us On YouTube

So over the last few weeks I've started taking a more serious approach to my video game. With the rise of Flipagram, Snapchat, Boomerang and countless other apps it's never been more important to show movement in your stories.

item.title: An Influencers Perspective on Influencer Marketing | In discussion with Diipa 1.3 Million Social Reach
item.description:
An Influencers Perspective on Influencer Marketing | In discussion with Diipa 1.3 Million Social Reach

Speaking on a panel with three entrepreneurs, the london lawyer turned influencer. Who has a total social reach 1.3 million. Talked how she turned her blog into a successful business. After the panel came to a close, I sat down with Diipa, "I was so nervous" she gasped.

item.title: EVENT REPORT | FASHIONTECH AND THE USER EXPERIENCE - Interlaced
item.description:
EVENT REPORT | FASHIONTECH AND THE USER EXPERIENCE - Interlaced

Image credit: Brooke Roberts Wearables London and INTERLACED came together this month to host an event exploring the intersection of fashion and technology to enhance user experiences. On Wednesday evening, we gathered in the stunning Kingsway Hall Hotel for an inspiring discussion on the latest in the fashiontech space.

item.title: New Faces 03
item.description:
New Faces 03

Reckon I'm going to become a hoarder in my older years as I can't seem to throw anything away. I feel that every photo and screenshot I take needs it's own special folder as it's bound to come in use eventually.

item.title: Rabbit In Your Headlights // Vlog 8
item.description:
Rabbit In Your Headlights // Vlog 8

When it works it just works. I don't care that the music was ripped from a live DJ Shadow set. It fucking bangs. Here's my latest little vlog. Today I found the reverse video button and went to town on it.
